rows.label: tlk70000023_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Adel-sama, Laura-sama. I
have decided to stay here.

rows.label: tlk70000023_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I was born in Iira and grew up
here, and I think this is where
I want my bones to rest too.

rows.label: tlk70000023_05_msg0003
rows.name:
I was born from the Divine Beast
and to the Divine Beast I shall
return. That's my final wish.

rows.label: tlk70000023_05_msg0004
rows.name:
So please... If you should
fail to defeat the Holy Grail,
think of it as fate...

rows.label: tlk70000023_05_msg0005
rows.name:
But give the fight
everything you've got!
